label: 遮那業
本: Saichō:  the Establishment of the Japanese Tendai  . Asian Humanities Press (University of Hawai'i Press) . 1984 (2000)
説明文: A course of study focussed on the Ta p'I lu che na ching 大毘盧遮那経（Mahāvairocanasūtra), the text on which the Womb Realm (Taizōkai) mandala was based.  The title of this course, Shanagō, was taken from the Japanese title of this sūtra, Daibirushanakyō. [胎蔵界、大毘盧遮那経]
